ingredients.item: 300g Waitrose British Cherries, pitted and halved
125g plain chocolate, broken into small pieces
3 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Eggs, separated

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 150Â°C, gas mark 2. Grease and base line a 20cm round cake tin.
Mix the cherries in the kirsch and set aside.
Melt the chocolate, butter and sugar together in a pan and cool slightly before stirring in the almonds, flour and egg yolks. Stir in half the soaked cherries plus the liquid.

Whisk the egg whites until stiff and fold into the chocolate mixture. Pour into the tin, sprinkle over the remaining cherries and bake for 40-45 minutes until cooked through. Cool slightly before removing from the tin. Sprinkle with icing sugar to serve.
